input.sentences: a view of a beach with a small wave .
there is a group of people looks like there having a beach party
the amount of people slowly decreases at the beach party .
as the night comes to a end the sunset is out .
output.sentences: The beach is my favorite place to go!
We love it so much we even tend to have our family parties there.
We take out kayaks, boats, and paddle boards.
Our favorite by far is rafting though.
We typically stay until sunset every single time we go!
